Player History
Drafted in 28th round, 446th overall pick, by Houston in 2015...
Released by Houston on 4/21/2015...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 5/1/2015 to a 1-year deal worth $904,000 per year...
Earned first career win on 8/22/2015...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/7/2016 to a 3-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/5/2016, off Robert James (BRO)...
Injured on 4/3/2017 with a Spasms Back, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from Chicago to Colorado on 4/21/2017 (Going to CHI: 1B Manuel Volpe. Going to COL: P Edson Villamil)...
